benchmark_details.name: GeoEval: Benchmark for Evaluating LLMs and Multi-Modal Models on Geometry Problem-Solving
benchmark_details.overview: GeoEval is a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate the performance of large language models (LLMs) and multi-modal models (MMs) in solving geometry math problems, consisting of various subsets with different problem complexities.
benchmark_details.data_type: geometry math problems with textual and diagram inputs

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a standardized benchmark for evaluating the geometry problem-solving capabilities of AI models.

data.source: Sourced from seven public datasets and includes newly created problems.
data.annotation: Annotated with complexity ratings for each problem.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated as the percentage of correct answers out of total questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better model performance on geometry problems.
methodology.baseline_results: WizardMath-70B achieved 55.67% accuracy on the GeoEval-2000 subset.
